abstract: Stocks climb and gain back some of their losses from earlier in week, as price of oil marks recovery.

headline.print_headline: Shares Recoup a Bit as Oil Prices Rally
headline.main: Modest Advance for the Market as Energy Shares Rise

snippet: The U.S. market closed higher as the prices of crude oil and natural gas recovered from steep plunges the day before.
lead_paragraph: The U.S. market closed higher as the prices of crude oil and natural gas recovered from steep plunges the day before.
